messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I have a new article up and thought some of you might be interested
as we are moving into the homeschool conference season. (if I made a horrible
grammar error please let me know so I can change it! LOL)
Thanks!
Teri

Connecting With Others
http://www.themestream.com/gspd_browse/browse/view_article.gsp?c_id=285264

Co-author of <A HREF="http://www.championpress.com/unschoolingmain.html">
Christian Unschooling: growing your child in the freedom of Christ</A>
Pre-order's available now!
Assistant Editor of <A HREF="http://www.egroups.com/group/Seedling">eGroups :
Seedling</A>
